information: Our company, GAEC MAISTERRENA, is located in Halsou in south-western France. For almost a decade, we have specialised in the production of Espelette chilli, a typical spice of the Basque region. We practise organic farming and only produce powder for use in various forms: dried salt and fleur de sel, olive oil, jelly or creamed chilli. All of our chillies are harvested by hand to guarantee the best colour and flavour for your dishes.
